title: Ticket #1798: manual pages missing in release tarball
description: Some (recently produced) manual pages are not being included in releases, as the Imakefile does not include them.
remarks:
2010-Dec-09 14:32:19 by smoler:
Karen added the missing man page entries to the Imakefile. Will wait to see if the nightly build turns up any error. If all is well, still will need to merge change into master branch.

2010-Dec-10 09:23:05 by smoler:
Nightlies indeed did have an error. Next problem located: the CONDOR_DOC Makefile needs to stuff all man pages, not just ones that begin with condor_. Examples are cleanup_release and filelock_undertaker.

2010-Dec-15 15:24:49 by smoler:
Greg commented out all changes in V7_4-branch.

Further updates placed into V7_5_5-branch. So, the missing man pages will appear in 7.5.5 upon release, and then into the 7.6 versions, when we get to it.

The change needed to go only into the CONDOR_DOC repository, in the Makefile, where the target just-the-man-pages needed correction to work with the build, placing all man pages into the right directory, not just ones that had command names beginning with condor_. All man pages are now explicitly listed in the Makefile.
check_ins:
2010-Dec-10 09:19   Check-in [25811]: target just-man-pages only made man pages starting with condor_; needed to be all man pages; gittrac #1798 (By Karen Miller )
2010-Dec-09 14:32   Check-in [19620]: added missing manual pages; gittrac #1798 (By Karen Miller )
creator: smoler
